item.title: 项目 👨‍💻
item.description: 研究生项目 Turbo Wallet - 记账软件 2022年1月 至 2022年3月，JavaScript GitHub (前端仓库): https://github.com/Kyxie/money-management.git GitHub (后端仓库): https://github.com/Kyxie/money-back.git 这是一个帮助我们记录每天生活

item.title: 关于我 👋
item.description: class Me: def __init__(self): self.name = "Kunyang Xie" self.prefer_name = "Kyrie" self.born_year = 1999 self.height = 181 self.hometown = "Weifang, Shandong, CN" self.grad_school = "uWaterloo" self.undergrad_school = "UESTC, UofG" self.curr_location = "Waterloo, ON, CA" def favs(self): self.fav_sport = "cycling, basketball" self.fav_series = "Better Call Saul" self.fav_color = "Macaroon Colors" self.fav_band = "the Chainsmokers" self.fav_city = "Chengdu" self.fav_cat = "ragdoll" self.fav_dog = "golden retriever" def contact_info(self): self.github = "Kyxie" self.instagram =
